name: Bootitems Core
author: BootItems

sections.description:
Bootitems Core is a companion plugin for Bootitems Themes, which provides core functionality and extends free themes features by adding functionality to import demo data content in just a click. The plugin requires the Advanced Import : One Click Import for WordPress or Theme Demo Data plugin to be installed.

How to use this Bootitems Core?

  1. While installing free themes by bootitems do kindly install & activate the plugin “Bootitems Core
  2. The plugin requires the Advanced Import : One Click Import for WordPress or Theme Demo Data plugin to be installed. So install and active it.
  3. To import demo contents, please go to Appearance > Demo Import.
  4. Choose your demo by checking live preview and then click import button to import the demo.
  5. Feel free to contact bootitems support team at ( https://bootitems.com/contact/ ) if you need any assistance.
sections.installation:
You can install Bootitems Core Plugins as following two ways:
1. Upload zip file from Dashboard->Plugin->Add New “upload plugin”.
2. Extract Bootitems Core and placed it to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
– Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is Bootitems Core is a free plugin?

Yes, it is a free plugin.

Does this plugin works with any WordPress theme

No, This plugin will only work with the themes developed by Bootitems.
